entities.name: luna lovegood
entities.description: Luna Lovegood is mentioned as watching Neville doing something with the Mimbulus mimbletonia plant. Her popping eyes appeared over the top of her upside-down magazine.

entities.name: nevile
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as proudly saying that the Mimbulus mimbletonia has loads of stuff and an amazing defensive mechanism. He held the plant up to his eyes and gave it a sharp prod with the tip of his quill.

entities.name: trevor
entities.description: Trevor is mentioned as being dumped into Harry's lap by Neville.

entities.name: mimbulus mimbletonia
entities.description: The Mimbulus mimbletonia plant is mentioned as having loads of stuff and an amazing defensive mechanism. It was held up to Neville's eyes and given a sharp prod with the tip of his quill.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as flinging her arms up in front of her face just in time to avoid getting hit by the liquid from the plant.

relationships.description: Neville is proud of the Mimbulus mimbletonia's amazing defensive mechanism.
Neville held Trevor in his hands before dumping him into Harry's lap.
Luna Lovegood was affected by the liquid from the Mimbulus mimbletonia plant, which spattered her magazine.
Both Luna Lovegood and Ginny were similarly affected by the liquid from the Mimbulus mimbletonia plant, with Luna's magazine being spattered and Ginny looking like she was wearing a slimy green hat.
Harry was affected by the liquid from the Mimbulus mimbletonia plant, which hit him in the face.
